content.title: First Computer 🖥️
content.description: It was an assembled computer powered by Intel Pentium IV. This was my first step into the world of magic.

content.title: Became a beyblade team member 💥
content.description: I was a hard-core beyblade fan. The day I saw it on TV, I asked my father to get me one. We all did. And he actually did buy me one.

content.title: Enrolled into B.Tech in Computer Science & Engg at KIIT University 🏫
Became Training & Placement Coordinator at my university
Got placed in-campus in Cognizant, Wipro, Infosys and Accenture
Graduated from KIIT University 🎓
content.description: A big achievement for me, since I was the first in my family to have a B.Tech degree.

content.title: Started working for large investment banking client
content.description: Well this was new. I had no idea how capital markets work, how private equities function, how and why share market goes up and down. Well now I know. Now I know the code that works in background to make all of this happen. This was my first intro to the world of Angular JS!

content.title: Enrolled in MSC. in Business Analytics at NUI Galway, Ireland
content.description: This was a dream come true. Add to that the beauty of Ireland. Never ceases to amaze you. Never! No matter wherever you go. ☘️

content.title: Auditor, NUIG CompSoc
content.description: Well, that's sweet! Isn't it ? This helped me meet many innovative minds, interact with them and even better, organise events with them.

content.title: Graduated from NUI Galway, Ireland 🎓
content.description: This could be unreal, but it isn't. Trust me. A big, very big achievement for me. Loads, and I mean loads of hardwork has gone to make this happen. Grateful to all who helped make this happen.

content.title: Joined Overstock Labs 🤩
content.description: I found my place. Amazing team and amazing work culture. Now I build resilient front-end apps that serve millions of customers with NextJS, Storybook, Fela and a lot more.
